definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: The results of disassembling or disposal must be reported to AEC for inspection.
sentences.chinese: 其拆除及处理结果，应报由原子能委员会检查。

definition: to make a report after the event/to make a supplementary report/to repay a kindness
to return to one's original trade/to put (a business etc) under the administration of the relevant central authority/(the) relevant (department in charge of sth)
to report for judgment/to submit for approval
final account/to calculate the final bill/fig. to draw up plans to deal with sth
to report for criticism/to submit for approval to higher authority
to report, requesting approval/written request for instructions
to audit and determine/to check and ratify/to appraise and decide/determination/on a deemed basis (taxation)/to deem
